name: Db Helper
tagline: Helps you with Sql Server database.
body:
# DB Helper

Developers Tools for viewing data and relations in SQL Server databases

## Table definition view
![Screenshot](https://281d3b8d-a-62cb3a1a-s-sites.googlegroups.com/site/dbinfohelper/home/tableDefinition.PNG?attachauth=ANoY7cryJdWEvWYax-N1IMK2D6siNTTbo61tZ4Uneg5TbMwy9smWq_GVQCfMp9VPqjFYStfAem5vBFpDrD5r69suuw2b_eH7we2A7ciK_h3XIaTB-7pK2WN0p8S8vknv4PkP7oqoBN1zVAjTrMvXSg2mELFFsGRcGgqQ-LjyLy48itFo1tDX8scV57IYMhrMtDRfQtqBnQAmE69e8wcKbqK3KQosXg3qISDjSUz_jSM--FvgbcEaY_w%3D&attredirects=0)
In table definition view you can see information about columns, key indexes, related parent and child tables, store procedures where this table is referenced and data from table.

## Data view
![Screenshot](https://281d3b8d-a-62cb3a1a-s-sites.googlegroups.com/site/dbinfohelper/home/tableValue.PNG?attachauth=ANoY7crkVtmrP2vrRPHonPbmLX1Av5h_xYsjyUOVOOMUsnceSn4i9VoGHpAqg2m6gtAjWBlZbLQ9rOjfaBR4ZqJZVP11yubpA3_FAKK4p1uRAbV7PDAXTvLovQVA4aveh_KXAlaF3GhA9h5OwMFusE3wp9d0iQ8PtI7oANqyEZSYKASCXp3kPHUnSkdJhacLW7DrWyfXvCFjKtYa77uXO1VEowYrq6ZdsYfcxrLS_CZmxZpctKB0wd8%3D&attredirects=0)
You can view table rows in this view.

## Filter data
You can filter rows in many deferent ways.
![](https://281d3b8d-a-62cb3a1a-s-sites.googlegroups.com/site/dbinfohelper/screenshots/FilterParent.png?attachauth=ANoY7cp_sqXzdtheRuCtcQ3BVrut2FegoeUnXb64u6dKv9teZVOAI7fmMxSnA1LV1Lr-srQvCbZwL68Jn6w7p2iTC8HL2IbOKZjRvq02W_j37YGI7O-i5tKb1glxsuX1WWfIAbuwea3_7FLKAfcEOgMkoVoJFOmbLk_TAlxaSfITQ2blAIul8h8eSnTd-r1FMv7tqmPQpw036M-9I7v_zUSwExLpBNR7SYygJd6xqG8aoq0XSyZKDkQ%3D&attredirects=0)

![](https://281d3b8d-a-62cb3a1a-s-sites.googlegroups.com/site/dbinfohelper/screenshots/FilterOnColumn.png?attachauth=ANoY7crfzSxUd8FmdOCNQh7_mldTL952lQvDxTtQW3I1k2HdLeqyyguL5CItffsLgr0a7yXZeMr9sc3RkpOajWwxvZ9BizL_pbRfOL0EpTUZ9A2GzNtV9FFJ8yprbEaEQawq3pcbfDzJLHJCkBsQo9jdWEdXzVejF3Btm6gQNnKN27EBCAegUoI5q2mYv2dsLm0MVuGXrjIVyFqjiUKFM6VlsRtv-7KFcwCjiFt9N5tdWTT4SwaLfAY%3D&attredirects=0)
